5120.name: Mage's Academy
description: The mages academy is fairly well decorated see that the drow prefer magic
over physical power greatly.

5122.name: Slave Chamber
description: The room is in shambles. Straw is strewn all about the room as beds for the
unfortunate creatures who have fallen prey to drow imperialism.

5107.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north and east. To the
south is an extremely large house.

5108.name: 2nd House
description: You stand inside the 2nd house of the city. The room is highly decorated
with statues of spiders and murals everywhere.

5116.name: Cleric Academy
description: This is the most lavish of the academies being that it is for the clerics.

5132.name: Long Hallway
description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.
To the south is a door.

5142.name: Eastern side of Chamber
description: You are on the eastern side of the chamber overlooking the pit. To the east
is a door while to the north is an altar.

5106.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north
is a large building.

5105.name: Throne Room
description: The throne room of the 3rd house is about as decorated as the inner
courtyard except with a blood covered altar in the center of the room.

5113.name: Main Chamber
description: This is the council chamber for the Matron Mother herself. A huge table
and chairs surrounding it sits in the center of the room.

5137.name: Mage's Barracks
description: The mage's living quarters is rather clean with the exception of a few
used component containers. It is rather well decorated as well. Cots line the
floor for the mages to sleep on. the only door is to the west.

5100.name: City Entrance
description: You are at the entrance to a small underground city. A great adamantite
gate lies open to the west allowing entrance into the city.
A huge gate opens to the west allowing entrance into the city.
A small hole in the ceiling leads up into darkness.
A small hole that looks to have been sealed at one time.
A large adamantite gate with giant spider shaped emblems stands here.

5111.name: 1st House
description: You stand in the inner courtyard of the 1st and largest house in the city.
The room is extremely large and decorative. Mural and paintings hang on the
walls depicting some battles and a spider queen.

5110.name: Main Gate
description: You are at the entrance to the 1st house of the city. A large gate, almost
as big and elegant as the one at the entrance to the city, stands here.
A large gate lies to the west.

5125.name: Throne Room
description: The throne room is basically similar to the inner courtyard in regards
to decor. there is a small throne behind the altar but that is about it.

5104.name: 3rd House
description: You stand inside the 3rd house of the city; it is fairly well decorated
by drow standards having a few statues, murals and such. A door leads to the
south.

5134.name: Long Hallway
description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

5145.name: The Altar
description: You are standing in front of a highly and freshly bloodstained altar.
Engraved on the top of the altar is a giant spider with a human head. Looking
down from the altar you see a large sacrificial pit.

5131.name: Long Hallway
description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

5143.name: Sacrificial Pit
description: A you climb down into the pit thousands of spiders cover you tearing your
body to shreds.
Lloth thanks you for your sacrifice.
You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!

5144.name: Western side of Chamber
description: You are on the western side of the main chamber overlooking a sacrificial
pit. To the north is an altar.

5149.name: The Treasury
description: This is obviously only a temporary storage place for the collected
treasure being rather bare.

5130.name: Long Hallway
description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

5148.name: Dais
description: You stand upon a dais behind the altar. Above you is a enormous illusion
of a female drow turning into a giant spider and back again. There is a door
to the west.

5128.name: Long Hallway
description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

5127.name: Hallway
description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.
To the north is a obsidian stairway.

5102.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going north and west.

5115.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading south. A building is
to the west.

5114.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north-south and east.

5133.name: Warrior's Barracks
description: The room is a complete mess. None of the beds are made, clothes and other
items have been left all about the room. Well drow warriors never were known
for neatness.

5112.name: Throne Room
description: The throne room of the 1st house is in one word...awesome. It is so
horrifying it is almost beautiful.

5147.name: Slave Pen
description: Rotten meat and breads lie about the floor while shackles hang from the
walls. The room wreaks of death. You almost become nauseous and decide to leave
the room since you were obviously too late to save the slave.

5109.name: Throne Room
description: The throne room of the 2nd house is just a little more decorative than
the inner courtyard having an altar in the center of the room.

5101.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate street going north-south. A large gate
lies to the east while a building lies to the west.

5123.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading west and south. To the
north is a relatively small house.

5117.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north
is a giant temple.
The entrance to the temple of Lloth.

5135.name: Grand Stairway
description: You are standing at the bottom of a giant obsidian and adamantite
stairway. The edges are trimmed with gold.

5141.name: Main Chamber
description: This is the south side of a large auditorium used for services by the
drow priestesses. In the center is a large sacrificial pit and beyond that is
an altar.

5126.name: Entrance Way
description: You stand in the entrance way to the temple which opens up to the north
into a large hallway going east and west. Small statues of spiders line the
entrance way's walls.

5121.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going eastward. To the north is
a building.

5140.name: Grand Stairway
description: You are climbing a set of obsidian stairs surrounded by adamantite walls.
To the north are a set of large golden doors.

5124.name: 4th house
description: You stand inside the 4th house of the city. Its inner courtyard is rather
dull by drow standards and rather small as well.

5119.name: Entrance to the Temple of Lloth
description: The temple is the largest building in the city. Even it's doors are beyond
imagination. Inside of the temple entrance, the walls are made of gold and
adamantite.

5136.name: Grand Hallway
description: You are standing in the middle of a grand hallway. The walls are
of the purest adamantite with gold trim. Mosaics line the walls.

5139.name: Cleric's Barracks
description: The bed chamber is brightly decorated with spider shaped statues, murals
and the like. Large beds line the floor making this a comfortable room to live
in.

5118.name: Warrior's Academy
description: This looks more like a barracks than a school.

5103.name: City street
description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. A large house
stands to the south.

5146.name: Slave Cells
description: This is the main room to the cell chambers for the slaves to be
sacrificed. You notice there are no guards around.

5129.name: Long Hallway
description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.
To the north is a door.

5138.name: Grand Hallway
description: You are walking down a grand hallway, heavily decorated with adamantite
and gold. To the north the hall goes down a flight of stairs while a door is
too the west.

5100.name: the goblin slave~
description: The defenseless goblin begs for mercy.
5100.room_name: A goblin slave lies here asleep.

5101.name: the drow commoner~
description: I doubt he is the type to give directions.
5101.room_name: A drow commoner walks on guard duty.

5102.name: the drow warrior noble~
description: He looks pissed off!
5102.room_name: The drow warrior noble stands here guarding his home.

5103.name: the drow mage noble~
description: The mage prepares to cast a spell ... at you!!
5103.room_name: The drow mage noble is here protecting his home.

5104.name: the drow priestess~
description: I wouldn't want go get on her bad side!
5104.room_name: The drow priestess is here shouting orders.

5105.name: The drow master~
description: The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight.
5105.room_name: The drow master stares at you angrily.

5106.name: The weapons master~
description: He definitely knows his way around in combat.
5106.room_name: The drow weapons master is here shadow boxing.

5107.name: the matron mother~
description: She looks really pissed off!
5107.room_name: The matron mother of the house is standing here.

5108.name: the matron mother~
description: She looks like she is about to rip your head off and eat it.
5108.room_name: The matron mother of the 1st house is waiting for you.

5109.name: the yochlol~
description: The yochlol is not in a good mood.
5109.room_name: A yochlol forms out of a swirling mist.

5110.name: the drow guard~
description: The drow guard blends so well with his environment, you barely see his form.
5110.room_name: The drow guard is here staring at you ominously.

5111.name: the drow scout~
description: The drow scout blends so well with her environment, you barely see her form.
5111.room_name: The drow scout is here sneaking among the shadows.
